bibliographic_metadata.Title: Mineral prospectivity prediction based on convolutional neural network and ensemble learning
bibliographic_metadata.Author: Hujun He, Haolei Zhu, Xingke Yang, Weiwei Zhang, Jinghao Wang

abstract: This study proposes an ensemble learning approach to synthesize convolutional neural network algorithms for mineral prospectivity prediction. By selecting 14 factors related to gold mineralization and utilizing six classical CNN models, the study achieved over 94% accuracy in predicting mineral prospectivity in the Bawanggou mine area, providing a comprehensive method for gold exploration.

types: Geochemical exploration data (Au, Ag, As, Cu, Pb, Zn, Hg, Sb, W, Mo)
Geological factors (ductile shear zones, brittle fault zones, mineralization–alteration body zones, metamorphic quartz sandstone zones)
dataset.scope: Bawanggou gold mine area to unknown area

key_points: Utilized ensemble learning to improve prediction stability.
Achieved over 94% accuracy using six CNN models.
Focused on gold mineralization factors in the Bawanggou mine area.
Developed a comprehensive method for mineral prospectivity mapping.
